articles.description: The Vikings season hasn’t played out as hoped in the standings, but running back Dalvin Cook isn’t the man to blame for that. Cook has scored at least one touchdown in every game he’s played this season and he added two more in last Sunday’s 34-20 win over th…
articles.content:

articles.title: Bowl projections: Notre Dame joins the College Football Playoff, giving the ACC two teams - USA TODAY
articles.description: Notre Dame's upset of No. 1 Clemson has shuffled the College Football Playoff race, giving the ACC two teams in the latest USA TODAY bowl projections.
articles.content:
USA TODAY Sports' Mackenzie Salmon spoke with Paul Myerberg about the 2020 college football bowl season.
